name: Ten of the best! Educational Programs
overview: Ten of the best! Educational Programs , compiled by Database Software in 1984, is a collection of ten simple educational programs. The collection was released as both a tape and a disk with a copy of the 'Eletctron User' magazine; the individual programs had been published in earlier editions. The games are : 1 : Company Count - test simple arithmetic. 2 : Dozer Disorder - unscramble words. 3 : Hiss - letter based version of Snake. 4 : Maths Fun - arithmetic quiz. 5 : Odd One Out - pick the odd one out. 6 : Yule Spell - Christmas-themed hangman. 7 : Crocodile Tears - missing letters game. 8 : Hungry Harry - making the correct change in a shop. 9 : Lemonade Stand - basic buying and selling. 10: Snail Trail - general knowledge quiz on animals.
